subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: When Tom Glavine woke up Monday to see rain pelting his hotel-room windows, he knew: another 24 hours to think about the most unusual postseason of his 20-year career.
snippet: When Tom Glavine woke up Monday to see rain pelting his hotel-room windows, he knew: another 24 hours to think about the most unusual postseason of his 20-year career.
